# Travel Information

If you are traveling internationally, we recommend flying into [Barcelona El Prat Airport](https://www.aeropuertobarcelona-elprat.com).

## Venue

The European Bioconductor Conference 2025 will take place at the
Barcelona Biomedical Research Park ([PRBB](https://prbb.org)).
